fields.name: CMAS Diver 1* Course
fields.description: The first qualification you need in your diving journey. The CMAS 1* course is a 6 week course consisting of theory and practical sessions, both in the pool and the sea

fields.name: CMAS Diver 2*
fields.description: In this 12 week course consisting of theory and waterwork you will complete 20 dives ranging from 6 meters to 20 meters in open sea

fields.name: Try a Dive (Pool)
fields.description: Interested in learning to scuba dive? A try a dive is a great way to see if scuba diving is for you. One of our highly qualified instructors will take you through a simple diving experience. All necessay gear is provided. This experience is conducted in a swimming pool and is reccomended as your first try a dive.

fields.name: Try a Dive (Sea)
fields.description: Interested in learning to scuba dive? This experince is reccomended as your second try a dive or for those who have dived before, see Try a Dive (pool) if this is your first experience with scuba. One of our highly qualified instructors will take you through a simple diving experience. All necessay gear is provided. This experience is conducted in a sheltered harbour with no more than 6 meters.

fields.name: Refresher Dive
fields.description: Dived before and keen to get back into the water? This refresher course and dive experince will get you up to speed again. One of our experienced instructors will take you through the basic diver theory and dry work again before you embark on a dive to a maximum of 6 meters (this is dependent on previous qualifications held). Gear rental is not included in this price, please see gear rental information for pricing.

fields.name: Shore Dive
fields.description: Enjoy a spectacular shore dive in one of our stunning locations on the Northwest of Ireland. Dive groups will be a maximum of 6 divers. Dive site is weather permitting, please contact us before booking if you have a particular site you would like to dive. Gear rental is not included in this price, please see gear rental information for pricing. Diver mst hold a valid 1* or above.

fields.name: Boat Dive
fields.description: Enjoy a spectacular boat dive in one of our stunning locations on the Northwest of Ireland. Dive groups will be a maximum of 6 divers. Dive site is weather permitting, please contact us before booking if you have a particular site you would like to dive. Gear rental is not included in this price, please see gear rental information for pricing. Diver mst hold a valid 1* or above.

fields.name: Full Scuba Gear Rental
fields.description: Gear rental for one dive. Gear included is; wetsuit, boots, gloves, BCD, regulator, fins, mask, weights and dive cylinder(full). You will need to organise gear rental at least 7 days prior to your scheduled dive.

fields.name: Cylinder and Weight belt rental
fields.description: Rental of a full dive cylinder and lead weights for one dive. Suits someone who may be travelling and has their own gear with them. Price includes; lead weights and belt plus a full dive cylinder.

fields.name: Gear rental for second dive
fields.description: If you are doing two dives with us please prepay for your gear rental for the second dive at least 7 days prior to the dive to ensure that we have your gear set aside.

fields.name: Bottle Fill-Air
fields.description: Cylinder fill with air. Bottle must be within service to be filled.

fields.name: Bottle Fill-Nitrox
fields.description: Nitrox fill. Bottle must be within service to be filled. Please specify nitrox percentage.
